entry.title: Instapath Selected to Participate in MassChallenge’s Austin 2018 Accelerator

link.title: Instapath Selected to Participate in MassChallenge's Austin 2018 Accelerator

entry.content:
We are proud to announce that Instapath was selected to participate in MassChallenge Texas’s 2018 accelerator program in Austin!

We will join 84 of other businesses for four months of programming that includes access to MassChallenge’s global network, world-class mentoring from industry experts, tailored programming, free co-working space at WeWork, and access to corporate partners. Learn more about our announcement and about MassChallenge at texas.masschallenge.org. Instapath Inc MassChallenge Texas WeWork
entry.summary: We are proud to announce that Instapath was selected to participate in MassChallenge Texas’s 2018 accelerator program in Austin!

entry.title: Instapath First Place Win International Business Model Competition

link.title: Instapath First Place Win International Business Model Competition

entry.content: IBMC First Place Win On May 12th Instapath took home the $30,000 grand prize at the 2017 International Business Model Competition in Mountain View, CA.
entry.summary: IBMC First Place Win On May 12th Instapath took home the $30,000 grand prize at the 2017 International Business Model Competition in Mountain View, CA.

entry.title: Instapath Awarded First Place in Tulane’s Novel Tech Challenge

link.title: Instapath Awarded First Place in Tulane's Novel Tech Challenge

entry.content: Instapath was awarded 1st place on April 19th in the experienced category of the 2017 Tulane Novel Tech Challenge for the advancement of technologies that improve health.
entry.summary: Instapath was awarded 1st place on April 19th in the experienced category of the 2017 Tulane Novel Tech Challenge for the advancement of technologies that improve health.

entry.title: Instapath Wins Louisiana Get Started Pitch Competition

link.title: Instapath Wins Louisiana Get Started Pitch Competition

entry.content: Instapath wins Get Started New Orleans 2017 pitch competition on March 22nd with a focus on patient care.
entry.summary: Instapath wins Get Started New Orleans 2017 pitch competition on March 22nd with a focus on patient care.
